languages.text: После же я умолк, ибо мог лишь молча свидетельствовать. Техноматы в грязных комбинезонах, почтительно лившие кровь из чаш в основание жуткого дерева — вставшего дыбом орудия, растопырившего лапы-стабилизаторы, словно ветви. На них, как спелые плоды, покачивались тела офицеров отсека.

traits.locale_text: После же я умолк, ибо мог лишь молча свидетельствовать. Инженеры в грязных комбинезонах, почтительно лившие кровь из чаш в основание жуткого дерева — вставшего дыбом орудия, растопырившего лапы-стабилизаторы, словно ветви. На них, как спелые плоды, покачивались тела офицеров отсека.

languages.text: After that, I was silent, for that was the only way I could continue to watch. Technomats in dirty coveralls reverentially poured chalices of blood onto the base of a macabre tree — a weapon pointed upward, its supports outspread like branches. And hanging from them like ripe fruit were the bodies of the bay's officers.
languages.original_text: После же я умолк, ибо мог лишь молча свидетельствовать. Техноматы в грязных комбинезонах, почтительно лившие кровь из чаш в основание жуткого дерева — вставшего дыбом орудия, растопырившего лапы-стабилизаторы, словно ветви. На них, как спелые плоды, покачивались тела офицеров отсека.

traits.locale_text: After that, I was silent, for that was the only way I could continue to watch. Engineers in dirty coveralls reverentially poured chalices of blood onto the base of a macabre tree — a weapon pointed upward, its supports outspread like branches. And hanging from them like ripe fruit were the bodies of the section's officers.

After that, I was silent, for that was the only way I could continue to watch. Engineers in dirty coveralls reverentially poured chalices of blood onto the base of a macabre tree — a weapon pointed upward, its supports outspread like branches. And hanging from them like ripe fruit were the bodies of the section's officers.

After that, I was silent, for that was the only way I could continue to watch. Engineers in dirty coveralls reverentially poured chalices of blood onto the base of a macabre tree — a weapon pointed upward, its supports outspread like branches. And hanging from them like ripe fruit were the bodies of the section's officers.

After that, I was silent, for that was the only way I could continue to watch. Technomats in dirty coveralls reverentially poured chalices of blood onto the base of a macabre tree — a weapon pointed upward, its supports outspread like branches. And hanging from them like ripe fruit were the bodies of the section's officers.

languages.text: Después, guardé silencio, pues solo así podría seguir observando. Tecnómatas con monos sucios vertían cálices de sangre con reverencia sobre la base de un árbol macabro: un arma apuntada hacia arriba cuyos soportes se extendían como ramas. Colgando de esas ramas estaban los cadáveres de los oficiales de la bahía.
languages.original_text: After that, I was silent, for that was the only way I could continue to watch. Technomats in dirty coveralls reverentially poured chalices of blood onto the base of a macabre tree — a weapon pointed upward, its supports outspread like branches. And hanging from them like ripe fruit were the bodies of the bay's officers.

traits.locale_text: Después, guardé silencio, pues solo así podría seguir observando. Tecnómatas con monos sucios vertían cálices de sangre con reverencia sobre la base de un árbol macabro: un arma apuntada hacia arriba cuyos soportes se extendían como ramas. Colgando de esas ramas estaban los cadáveres de los oficiales de la sección.

languages.text: 在那之后，我一言不发。因为只有这样，我才能继续看着这一切。穿着肮脏工作服的技工们满心虔诚，将装满鲜血的圣杯倒在某棵象征死亡的树下。那是一把指向上方的武器，武器的支架仿佛树枝一样伸展开来。而在树上，像成熟的果实一样挂在枝头的，则是那片甲板军官们的尸体。
languages.original_text: After that, I was silent, for that was the only way I could continue to watch. Technomats in dirty coveralls reverentially poured chalices of blood onto the base of a macabre tree — a weapon pointed upward, its supports outspread like branches. And hanging from them like ripe fruit were the bodies of the bay's officers.

traits.locale_text: 在那之后，我一言不发。因为只有这样，我才能继续看着这一切。穿着肮脏工作服的机械殉道者们满心虔诚，将装满鲜血的圣杯倒在某棵象征死亡的树下。那是一把指向上方的武器，武器的支架仿佛树枝一样伸展开来。而在树上，像成熟的果实一样挂在枝头的，则是那个部门军官们的尸体。

languages.text: その後、私はただ黙った。それが、私が観察を続けられる唯一の術だった。汚れた作業服を着たテクノマット達は、不気味な木の根元に血の杯をうやうやしく注ぐ。武器は上を向き、その支柱は枝のように広がっていた。そして、熟した果実のようにそれにぶら下がっていたのは、ベイの士官達の死体だった。
languages.original_text: After that, I was silent, for that was the only way I could continue to watch. Technomats in dirty coveralls reverentially poured chalices of blood onto the base of a macabre tree — a weapon pointed upward, its supports outspread like branches. And hanging from them like ripe fruit were the bodies of the bay's officers.

traits.locale_text: その後、私はただ黙った。それが、私が観察を続けられる唯一の術だった。汚れた作業服を着たテクノマット達は、不気味な木の根元に血の杯をうやうやしく注ぐ。武器は上を向き、その支柱は枝のように広がっていた。そして、熟した果実のようにそれにぶら下がっていたのは、ベイの士官達の死体だった。

languages.text: Danach blieb ich stumm, denn nur so konnte ich weiter zusehen. Technomaten in schmutzigen Overalls kippten ehrfürchtig Kelche voller Blut auf die Basis eines makabren Baums – eine nach oben gerichtete Waffe, deren Bestandteile sich auffächerten wie Äste. Und an diesen hingen wir reiche Früchte die Leichen der Offiziere der Bucht.
languages.original_text: After that, I was silent, for that was the only way I could continue to watch. Technomats in dirty coveralls reverentially poured chalices of blood onto the base of a macabre tree — a weapon pointed upward, its supports outspread like branches. And hanging from them like ripe fruit were the bodies of the bay's officers.

languages.text: J'ai gardé le silence après cela, car c'était la seule façon de continuer à regarder. Des technomates dans leurs combinaisons en piteux état versaient avec déférence des calices de sang sur un arbre macabre : une arme pointée vers le haut, ses pieds déployés comme des branches. Et, accrochés à ces branches comme des fruits trop mûrs pendaient les corps des officiers de la baie.
languages.original_text: After that, I was silent, for that was the only way I could continue to watch. Technomats in dirty coveralls reverentially poured chalices of blood onto the base of a macabre tree — a weapon pointed upward, its supports outspread like branches. And hanging from them like ripe fruit were the bodies of the bay's officers.

traits.locale_text: J'ai gardé le silence après cela, car c'était la seule façon de continuer à regarder. Des technomates dans leurs combinaisons en piteux état versaient avec déférence des calices de sang sur un arbre macabre : une arme pointée vers le haut, ses pieds déployés comme des branches. Et, accrochés à ces branches comme des fruits trop mûrs pendaient les corps des officiers de la section.

languages.text: Ardından suspus oldum çünkü izlemeye devam edebilmemin tek yolu buydu. Kirli iş tulumları içindeki teknomatlar, büyük bir saygıyla meşum bir ağacın dibine kupalarca kan döküyordu. Ağaç, yukarı doğrultulmuş bir silah gibiydi. Destekleri dal gibi uzanıyordu ve bu dallardan da bölme subaylarının bedenleri olgun meyveler misali sallanıyordu.
languages.original_text: After that, I was silent, for that was the only way I could continue to watch. Technomats in dirty coveralls reverentially poured chalices of blood onto the base of a macabre tree — a weapon pointed upward, its supports outspread like branches. And hanging from them like ripe fruit were the bodies of the bay's officers.

traits.locale_text: Ardından suspus oldum çünkü izlemeye devam edebilmemin tek yolu buydu. Kirli iş tulumları içindeki teknomatlar, büyük bir saygıyla meşum bir ağacın dibine kupalarca kan döküyordu. Ağaç, yukarı doğrultulmuş bir silah gibiydi. Destekleri dal gibi uzanıyordu ve bu dallardan da bölme subaylarının bedenleri olgun meyveler misali sallanıyordu.
